sentences.en: Aggregate functions are used to summarize all the data in a table.
sentences.cn: 聚合函数用于汇总表中的所有数据.
你能为我们的观众简要介绍下你的观点 吗 ?

sentences.en: Finally we summarize our work and then pointthe improvement of our work.
sentences.cn: 文章的最后作者总结了在本项目实践中的工作心得体会,提出了一些以后工作的改进方向.

sentences.en: I will summarize what I have done.
sentences.cn: 我将概述我所做的事情。

sentences.en: It will be useful to summarize the relevant Gaussian formulae.
sentences.cn: 有必要概括地讲一下有关的高斯公式.

sentences.en: Let us summarize the governing equations for a fluid, previously deduced.
sentences.cn: 现在让我们将上面推导出来的流体运动基本方程组归并在一起.

sentences.en: Objective : To summarize the clinical experiences of double - valve replacement in 76 cases.
sentences.cn: 目的: 总结76例双瓣膜替换术的经验.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To summarize ingredient and pharmacological action of Oviductus Ranae.
sentences.cn: 对林蛙油的成分、药理作用和展望作了综述.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo summarize the experience of diagnosis and treatment of true hermaphroditism.
sentences.cn: 目的总结对真两性畸形的诊断和治疗经验.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo summarize the experiences on and treatment for traumatic liver rupture.
sentences.cn: 目的总结外伤性肝破裂的诊治经验.

sentences.en: The authors summarize their views in the introduction.
sentences.cn: 作者在序言里概述了他们的观点。

sentences.en: Theories in cognitive psychology are attempts to summarize large sets of data.
sentences.cn: 认知心理学的各种理论都是试图概括大套的资料.

sentences.en: They need to find information quickly and be able to summarize it in clear language.
sentences.cn: 他们需要快速找到信息并能用清晰的语言概述.

sentences.en: To summarize 46 cases of severe neonatal asphyxia recovery and nursing.
sentences.cn: 总结46例新生儿重度窒息的复苏与护理.

sentences.en: We mag summarize our arguments as follows.
sentences.cn: 我们可以把上述讨论小结如下.

sentences.en: We may summarize the situation then as follows.
sentences.cn: 于是我们可将上述情况归结如下.

trans.tran_en: to make a short statement giving only the main information and not the details of a plan, event, report etc
